duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and execute manufacturing orders, ensuring timely customer/overseas communication to achieve on-time delivery.
Maintain order entry, WIP, and track shipping information for import and domestic shipments.
Responsible for lab dip, strike-off, and put-up approvals, and present production-related materials professionally to buyers.
Conduct weekly customer production follow-up meetings and organize customer samples from overseas.
Run and organize tracking/sales reports, and receive/organize/tag incoming shipments sent to the office.

education_certification.credential: Fashion Merchandising Education, Bachelor's degree preferred
